/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a driver's eye view of the scene. The street is flanked by lush green trees and towering buildings, creating a harmonious blend of nature and architecture. A red truck and a black car add a splash of color to the scene, hinting at the city's vibrant life. The sky above is a hazy gray, possibly due to pollution or fog, adding a touch of mystery to the urban landscape. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and gives a sense of being in the midst of the action.
